```
services:
  service:
    image: nginx
    deploy:
        resources:
            limits:
              cpus: 0.50
              memory: 512M
            reservations:
              cpus: 0.25
              memory: 128M
```

```
service:
  image: nginx
  mem_limit: 512m
  mem_reservation: 128M
  cpus: 0.5
  ports:
    - "80:80"
```
